definitions: (of a hole, screw, bolt, etc.) having a screw thread

examples.text: put the threaded end of the bolt through the hole

definitions: denoting or relating to online posts or messages forming part of a a linked sequence

examples.text: a good post on a blog with threaded comments can be like attending a meetup in your own space at your own time

shortDefinitions: denoting online posts forming part of linked sequence

definitions: (of a needle) having a thread of cotton or other fiber through its eye

examples.text: bring the threaded needle up through the knitting from back to front
